scripts.build:linux: npm run build --prefix core && pkg core/dist/cli.cjs --targets node16-linux-x64 --output bin/cross-platform-tool-linux --config core/package.json
scripts.build:macos: npm run build --prefix core && pkg core/dist/cli.cjs --targets node16-macos-x64 --output bin/cross-platform-tool-macos --config core/package.json
scripts.build:win: npm run build --prefix core && pkg core/dist/cli.cjs --targets node16-win-x64 --output bin/cross-platform-tool-win.exe --config core/package.json
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix core && pkg core/dist/cli.cjs --targets node16-linux-x64,node16-macos-x64,node16-win-x64 --output bin/cross-platform-tool --config core/package.json
scripts.build:extension: npm run build:all && npm run compile --prefix vscode-extension && npm run package --prefix vscode-extension
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix core && rm -rf bin/cross-platform-tool*
